{"plugin":{"id":"org.ekstep.questionunit.mcq","version":"1.1","templateId":"horizontalMCQ"},"data":{"question":{"text":"

How manager’s commission on net profit after charging such commission is computed?

","image":"","audio":"","audioName":"","hint":""},"options":[{"text":"

Net profit before charging such commission x Rate of commission / 100

","image":"","audio":"","audioName":"","hint":"","isCorrect":false,"$$hashKey":"object:1185"},{"text":"

Net profit before charging such commission x Rate of commission / (100 + rate of commission)

","image":"","audio":"","audioName":"","hint":"","isCorrect":true,"$$hashKey":"object:1186"},{"text":"

Net profit after charging such commission x Rate of commission / (100 – rate of  commission)

","image":"","audio":"","audioName":"","isCorrect":false,"$$hashKey":"object:1196"},{"text":"

Net profit after charging such commission x Rate of commission / (100 + rate of commission)

","image":"","audio":"","audioName":"","isCorrect":false,"$$hashKey":"object:1201"}],"questionCount":0,"media":[]},"config":{"metadata":{"max_score":1,"isShuffleOption":true,"isPartialScore":true,"templateType":"Horizontal","name":"How manager’s commission on net profit after charging such commission is computed?
